divs: Sighting DetailsWe were out bike riding when my friends 10 year old daughter noticed an object sitting under the clouds blinking.At first we thought it was a bird riding the air currents,then we noticed that this object was blinking .The object then staerted moving in a north easterly direction in the sky when all of a sudden another object popped out of the clouds and started blinking just like the first object we noticed.This second object then moved towards the first one we spotted and caught up to the first object with the blinking light and then they both shot into the clouds.
Summary: A friend of mine and his daughter witnessed a craft come down in the city of winnipeg.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There were 3 other sightings in Winnipeg on or around July 28th 2005
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
